response.original_title: Behind The Blades: The Making of Dylan's New Nightmare
response.overview: Behind-the-scenes documentary about the making of "Dylan's New Nightmare", from lead actor Dave McRae busting his tooth during the second take of the very first scene to Miko Hughes becoming so immersed in his role that he actually bruised his face hitting himself.
response.title: Behind The Blades: The Making of Dylan's New Nightmare
